extension.name: PLG_JUMULTITHUMB
extension.author: Denys Nosov
extension.license: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/ Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 3.0 License

field.name: colorboxparam
field.default: slideshow: true, slideshowAuto: false, slideshowStart: 'Start', slideshowStop: 'Stop', current: 'Image {current} of {total}'
field.label: PLG_JUMULTITHUMB_PARAMETERS

field.name: customjsparam
field.default: <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="[CUSTOM CSS URL]" /><script type="text/javascript" src="[CUSTOM JS URL]"></script><script type="text/javascript">[CUSTOM JS CODE]</script>
